text: Desmiphora hirticollis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Olivier in 1795. It is known from the United States to South America, including the Galapagos Islands, Puerto Rico, Jamaica, and the Caribbean.BioLib.cz - Desmiphora hirticollis. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphora Category:Beetles described in 1795
title: Desmiphora hirticollis
